releaseNotes:
New design
New category called "Reduce Stress"
Easy access to our new App community
Updates on new content
description:
DARE offers a fresh and medication-free approach to eradicating panic attacks and life-restricting feelings of anxiety, however deeply rooted. 
 
A downloadable library of over 50 practical audio guides based on real-life experiences empowers you to engage with your feelings differently. If worry is distracting you from doing your job, enjoying time with your loved ones, or getting a good night’s sleep, then DARE can help.
 
With fresh content every week you’ll build your own consistent response toolkit to help you manage anxiety and panic attacks in a clear and structured way, and over time, learn how to fade them out of your life completely.    
 
The DARE response method acts as a mental safeguard to prevent minor issues from spiralling into debilitating problems. Practising it will ease the full spectrum of anxiety-related problems which include muscle tension, teeth grinding, insomnia, and general feelings of foreboding.
 
You’ll benefit from monthly challenges and the full peer-to-peer support of an empathetic online community who will carry you through every setback and onward step with honesty and understanding. Freedom from anxiety and panic attacks is possible if you can dare to think differently.     
 
The DARE App intelligently combines technology with the untold power of shared human experience to help people at every stage of their journey through anxiety to untangle their thoughts and reach their goal to live well. 
 
How Was the DARE Response Developed?
 
Psychology graduate Barry McDonagh created DARE whilst searching for a solution to his own personal anxiety and panic problems. Barry went on to become a best-selling author of several books related to the treatment of anxiety including the 2001 publication Panic Away. 
 
Testimonials
 
“All the counselling, medication and books I have purchased within the 15 years just masked the fear, but never eliminated it for good. Your knowledge has put me at peace and your wording was clear and understanding. Perfect.”
 
“Non-judgemental, honest and indeed 'daring' approach which busts the myths surrounding all forms of anxiety.” 
 
“The approach is the first one that has actually worked for me.” 
 
Through transformational thinking the DARE response can:
 
* Ease Anxiety 
* Reduce stress
* Calm Your Mind
* Lengthen Sleep
* Improve Focus and Concentration
* Make you More Present in Your Relationships
* Break Cycles of Negative Thinking 
* Allow forgiveness of Yourself and Others 
* Increase self-worth and confidence
* And so much more...
 
DARE SUBSCRIPTION
• Monthly ($9.99)
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription, where applicable
 
Find out more about our Terms of Service here: https://dareresponse.com/terms-of-service-statement/
 
We value your privacy. Full details of our privacy policy can be found here:
https://dareresponse.com/privacy-policy/
